verses.text_plain: A false balance is abomination to the Lord: but a just weight is his delight.
verses.verse_html:
1A false balance is abomination to the Lord: but a just weight is his delight. ▼
▼ A false…: Heb. Balances of deceit
 , ▼
▼ just…: Heb. perfect stone

footnotes.body_text: ▼ A false…: Heb. Balances of deceit
footnotes.body_html: ▼ A false…: Heb. Balances of deceit
▼ just…: Heb. perfect stone

verses.text_plain: When pride cometh, then cometh shame: but with the lowly is wisdom.
verses.verse_html: 2When pride cometh, then cometh shame: but with the lowly is wisdom.

verses.text_plain: The integrity of the upright shall guide them: but the perverseness of transgressors shall destroy them.
verses.verse_html: 3The integrity of the upright shall guide them: but the perverseness of transgressors shall destroy them.

verses.text_plain: Riches profit not in the day of wrath: but righteousness delivereth from death.
verses.verse_html: 4Riches profit not in the day of wrath: but righteousness delivereth from death.

verses.text_plain: The righteousness of the perfect shall direct his way: but the wicked shall fall by his own wickedness.
verses.verse_html:
5The righteousness of the perfect shall direct his way: but the wicked shall fall by his own wickedness. ▼
▼ direct: Heb. rectify

verses.text_plain: The righteousness of the upright shall deliver them: but transgressors shall be taken in their own naughtiness.
verses.verse_html: 6The righteousness of the upright shall deliver them: but transgressors shall be taken in their own naughtiness.

verses.text_plain: When a wicked man dieth, his expectation shall perish: and the hope of unjust men perisheth.
verses.verse_html: 7When a wicked man dieth, his expectation shall perish: and the hope of unjust men perisheth.

verses.text_plain: The righteous is delivered out of trouble, and the wicked cometh in his stead.
verses.verse_html: 8The righteous is delivered out of trouble, and the wicked cometh in his stead.

verses.text_plain: An hypocrite with his mouth destroyeth his neighbour: but through knowledge shall the just be delivered.
verses.verse_html: 9An hypocrite with his mouth destroyeth his neighbour: but through knowledge shall the just be delivered.

verses.text_plain: When it goeth well with the righteous, the city rejoiceth: and when the wicked perish, there is shouting.
verses.verse_html: 10When it goeth well with the righteous, the city rejoiceth: and when the wicked perish, there is shouting.

verses.text_plain: By the blessing of the upright the city is exalted: but it is overthrown by the mouth of the wicked.
verses.verse_html: 11By the blessing of the upright the city is exalted: but it is overthrown by the mouth of the wicked.

verses.text_plain: He that is void of wisdom despiseth his neighbour: but a man of understanding holdeth his peace.
verses.verse_html:
12He that is void of wisdom despiseth his neighbour: but a man of understanding holdeth his peace. ▼
▼ void…: Heb. destitute of heart

footnotes.body_html: ▼ void…: Heb. destitute of heart

verses.text_plain: A talebearer revealeth secrets: but he that is of a faithful spirit concealeth the matter.
verses.verse_html:
13A talebearer revealeth secrets: but he that is of a faithful spirit concealeth the matter. ▼
▼ A talebearer: Heb. He that walketh, being a talebearer

tokens.text: but he that is of a faithful

footnotes.body_text: ▼ A talebearer: Heb. He that walketh, being a talebearer
footnotes.body_html: ▼ A talebearer: Heb. He that walketh, being a talebearer

verses.text_plain: Where no counsel is, the people fall: but in the multitude of counsellors there is safety.
verses.verse_html: 14Where no counsel is, the people fall: but in the multitude of counsellors there is safety.

verses.text_plain: He that is surety for a stranger shall smart for it: and he that hateth suretiship is sure.
verses.verse_html:
15He that is surety for a stranger shall smart for it: and he that hateth suretiship is sure. ▼
▼ smart: Heb. be sore broken
 , ▼
▼ suretiship: Heb. those that strike hands

footnotes.body_html: ▼ smart: Heb. be sore broken

footnotes.body_text: ▼ suretiship: Heb. those that strike hands
footnotes.body_html: ▼ suretiship: Heb. those that strike hands

verses.text_plain: A gracious woman retaineth honour: and strong men retain riches.
verses.verse_html: 16A gracious woman retaineth honour: and strong men retain riches.

verses.text_plain: The merciful man doeth good to his own soul: but he that is cruel troubleth his own flesh.
verses.verse_html: 17The merciful man doeth good to his own soul: but he that is cruel troubleth his own flesh.

verses.text_plain: The wicked worketh a deceitful work: but to him that soweth righteousness shall be a sure reward.
verses.verse_html: 18The wicked worketh a deceitful work: but to him that soweth righteousness shall be a sure reward.

verses.text_plain: As righteousness tendeth to life: so he that pursueth evil pursueth it to his own death.
verses.verse_html: 19As righteousness tendeth to life: so he that pursueth evil pursueth it to his own death.

verses.text_plain: They that are of a froward heart are abomination to the Lord: but such as are upright in their way are his delight.
verses.verse_html: 20They that are of a froward heart are abomination to the Lord: but such as are upright in their way are his delight.

tokens.text: They that are of a froward

verses.text_plain: Though hand join in hand, the wicked shall not be unpunished: but the seed of the righteous shall be delivered.
verses.verse_html: 21Though hand join in hand, the wicked shall not be unpunished: but the seed of the righteous shall be delivered.

verses.text_plain: As a jewel of gold in a swine’s snout, so is a fair woman which is without discretion.
verses.verse_html:
22As a jewel of gold in a swine’s snout, so is a fair woman which is without discretion. ▼
▼ is without: Heb. departeth from

footnotes.body_html: ▼ is without: Heb. departeth from

verses.text_plain: The desire of the righteous is only good: but the expectation of the wicked is wrath.
verses.verse_html: 23The desire of the righteous is only good: but the expectation of the wicked is wrath.

verses.text_plain: There is that scattereth, and yet increaseth; and there is that withholdeth more than is meet, but it tendeth to poverty.
verses.verse_html: 24There is that scattereth, and yet increaseth; and there is that withholdeth more than is meet, but it tendeth to poverty.

verses.text_plain: The liberal soul shall be made fat: and he that watereth shall be watered also himself.
verses.verse_html:
25The liberal soul shall be made fat: and he that watereth shall be watered also himself. ▼
▼ liberal…: Heb. soul of blessing

footnotes.body_html: ▼ liberal…: Heb. soul of blessing

verses.text_plain: He that withholdeth corn, the people shall curse him: but blessing shall be upon the head of him that selleth it.
verses.verse_html: 26He that withholdeth corn, the people shall curse him: but blessing shall be upon the head of him that selleth it.

verses.text_plain: He that diligently seeketh good procureth favour: but he that seeketh mischief, it shall come unto him.
verses.verse_html: 27He that diligently seeketh good procureth favour: but he that seeketh mischief, it shall come unto him.

verses.text_plain: He that trusteth in his riches shall fall: but the righteous shall flourish as a branch.
verses.verse_html: 28He that trusteth in his riches shall fall: but the righteous shall flourish as a branch.

verses.text_plain: He that troubleth his own house shall inherit the wind: and the fool shall be servant to the wise of heart.
verses.verse_html: 29He that troubleth his own house shall inherit the wind: and the fool shall be servant to the wise of heart.

verses.text_plain: The fruit of the righteous is a tree of life; and he that winneth souls is wise.
verses.verse_html:
30The fruit of the righteous is a tree of life; and he that winneth souls is wise. ▼
▼ winneth: Heb. taketh

verses.text_plain: Behold, the righteous shall be recompensed in the earth: much more the wicked and the sinner.
verses.verse_html: 31Behold, the righteous shall be recompensed in the earth: much more the wicked and the sinner.
